Package net.silthus.schat.command

Interface Command.Builder<B extends Command.Builder<B,C>,C extends Command>

Type Parameters:
B - the type of the command builder
C - the type of the command
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChatCommand.Builder, CommandBuilder, CreatePrivateChannelCommand.Builder, JoinChannelCommand.Builder, LeaveChannelCommand.Builder, SendMessageCommand.Builder, SendPrivateMessageCommand.Builder
Enclosing interface:
Command
public static interface Command.Builder<B extends Command.Builder<B,C>,C extends Command>
A generic builder used to construct commands.
Since:
next

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Function<B,? extends C>
    command()
    Gets the factory that creates the command from this builder.
    default C
    create()
    Creates a new command instance from this builder.
    default Result
    execute()
    Directly creates and then executes the command created from this builder.
    B
    use(Function<B,? extends C> command)
    Instructs this builder to use the given command factory.
